name: Shadow Circuit
description: Shadow Circuit is a fast-paced, arcade-style, sports game in VR with unique physics and gravity mechanics. Players face down an AI opponent that challenges their reflexes and spatial awareness.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i7-6700 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1080 or AMD R9 Fury X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
